item.description:
Negation Hearts. At DAMATAS New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.  There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there. Pizzas are $2.99 on Monday nights.


      There is now a modest membership fee of $2.00 quarterly. the fee is for the whole group not just Kitty Whist. You will see "How to pay: Pay online or by cash or check" and " Pay online " on the home page of the group.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Negation Hearts at DAMATAS in Salem
